revised_title: Embryology and Development of Angiopteris evecta
tldr: The author studied the embryology and development of Angiopteris evecta, a type of eusporangiate fern. They observed the germination of spores, the formation of sexual organs, and the development of the embryo. The author also discussed the structure and growth of the root, stem, and leaves of the plant, as well as its unique method of emerging from the prothallium.
